reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Yayasan TRIASKTI ARUM LESTARI - Ecofriendly Borobudur community

description.narrative: The Borobudur District consist of 20 village of traditional lands lie with Borobudur Temple UNESCO Culture Heritage in it located at Central Java Indonesia. The Communities have worked to strengthen traditions low impact agriculture such as bamboo papa ya and cassava and ecotourism around the Temple and also for strengthening customary law and local institution for sustainable use of farm land and water resources. The initiative intend to support farmers groups and small scale papaya and cassava honey producers ,to prepare raw material and bamboo product to increase other function such as : Save water in heavy rain (Bamboo root kept 90 % water received) Bamboo forest decrease 2-4 centigrate Celcius compare to outside forrest Disaster Risk reduction dur ing Merapi Volcano prolonged eruption waste management for charcoal and fertilizer. The activities included workshop training and capacity building brochure and television publication and 1 year monitoring and evaluation beyond the program.The target prog ramme are 20 village in Borobudur Sub District Magelang Regency Central Java Province.Direct beneficiaries : 100 producers/artisan in 20 villages?38 culinary product :honey cassava papayaetc from 20 villages?20 Batik Artisan from Wanurejo Borobudur Giriten gah villages?21 Bamboo Handicraft Producers from Kebonsari Village?21 Bamboo Farmers/Producer from Wringinputih Village
